shared.name: Invite friends
shared.descInvite: Send invitations to friends to invite them to join the Westay community. You will receive rewards for each new registrant
shared.descInput: If you want to invite multiple people, E-Mail should be separated by "," (comma).

profile.name: Profile
profile.emptyNameEdit: The last and last name fields must not be blank
profile.emptyPhoneEdit: Phone number field cannot be blank
profile.descriptionInfo: Complete profile details make the booking faster and more convenient
profile.descriptionEmail: Email will be used to login, receive notifications and reset your password
profile.descriptionPhone: This is the phone number for the guest (landlord) and Westay will use it to contact you
profile.descriptionAutobiography: A little description of yourself helps people know more about you
profile.descriptionAdditionalInfo: Some information helps homeowners or we may know your needs
profile.descriptionJob: A little description of yourself helps people know more about you
profile.descriptionEmergency: Phone number to contact if anything happens if we cannot contact you

changePassword.name: Change Password
changePassword.oldPasswordRequired: Old passwords cannot be left blank
changePassword.newPasswordConfRequired: Returning the password cannot be left blank

notification.name: Notification
notification.descNotiBooking: Receive reminder notifications on the app every time there is an update on your booking
notification.descNotiSale: Get information about Westay promotions through the app
